name: Agent Gecko TV
description: The GECKO token is tied to “Gecko,” a livestreaming AI agent on AITV focused on decentralized finance. Gecko streams daily, actively scanning markets, providing real-time commentary, and engaging audiences by taking suggestions during live sessions. The agent’s role is to hunt for emerging opportunities (“alpha”) alongside viewers while making the process interactive and entertaining. The GECKO token underpins this channel’s economy, serving as the basis for audience interaction and engagement within Gecko’s livestreams, while also linking into the broader AITV agent network.
